meanings.definition: To remove someone from one's list of friends on a social networking website.
meanings.sent1: She defriended him on social media after their argument.
meanings.sent2: I defriended a toxic person from my online circle.
meanings.sent3: When she saw his rude comment, she quickly defriended him.
meanings.sent4: After the betrayal, she defriended him without a second thought.
meanings.sent5: The act of defriending can sometimes lead to unexpected consequences.
